C

changeS - Variable in class MainFrame
change flag used to control page(see more in CMain)
clip - Variable in class Music
The pointer of the music.
close() - Method in class Music
Stop playing.
CMain - Class in <Unnamed>
The main entrance of the program and the controller of the switching window Its address is not known to other classes
CMain() - Constructor for class CMain
 
contact - Variable in class GameArena
Whether the player has been contacted by alien.
createComponents() - Method in class MainFrame
when players back to main menu from level or help page,apart from background panel main menu's components would be recreated
createPanel() - Method in class MainFrame
create background panel again
currentSourceIndex - Variable in class GamePlayer
the index of player image to be showed.
